implementation.name: CORBA Server
implementation.description: Distributes EJB interface implementations to remote clients using the RMI-IIOP protocol.
implementation.detail: Implements the EJBHome and EJBObject as stubs and ties
Delegates calls made remotely on its EJBHome and EJBObject stub/ties to the equivalent objects of the IntraVM Server.
Allows vendors/users to plug in any CORBA ORB implementation that provides Java mapping 2.3, RMI over IIOP, and POA.
Uses Tyrex as an Object Transaction Service (OTS) implementation.
If OpenORB is used as the ORB implementation, then the openorb-X.jar libraries are required. If any other ORB is used, these do not need to be included.
